entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 10:57 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:57 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
